verses.verse: And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Speak <S%H1696><s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them, <S%H3588>When<s%> ye be <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of your <S%H4186>habitations,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> <S%H5414>give<s%> unto you,

And will <S%H6213>make<s%> an offering by <S%H801>fire<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> a burnt <S%H5930>offering,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> a <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> in <S%H6381>performing<s%> a <S%H5088>vow,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> in a freewill <S%H5071>offering,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> in your solemn <S%H4150>feasts,<s%> to <S%H6213>make<s%> a <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>savor<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H1241>herd,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> the flock: <S%H6629><s%>

Then shall he that <S%H7126>offereth<s%> his <S%H7133>offering<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7126>bring<s%> a meat <S%H4503>offering<s%> of a tenth <S%H6241>deal<s%> of <S%H5560>flour<s%> <S%H1101>mingled<s%> with the <S%H7243>fourth<s%> part of a <S%H1969>hin<s%> of <S%H8081>oil.<s%>

And the <S%H7243>fourth<s%> part of a <S%H1969>hin<s%> of <S%H3196>wine<s%> for a drink <S%H5262>offering<s%> shalt thou <S%H6213>prepare<s%> <S%H5921>with<s%> the burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H2077>sacrifice,<s%> for <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3532>lamb.<s%>

Or <S%H176><s%> for a <S%H352>ram,<s%> thou shalt <S%H6213>prepare<s%> for a meat <S%H4503>offering<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> tenth <S%H6241>deals<s%> of <S%H5560>flour<s%> <S%H1101>mingled<s%> with the <S%H7992>third<s%> part of a <S%H1969>hin<s%> of <S%H8081>oil.<s%>

And for a drink <S%H5262>offering<s%> thou shalt <S%H7126>offer<s%> the <S%H7992>third<s%> part of a <S%H1969>hin<s%> of <S%H3196>wine,<s%> for a <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>savor<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And <S%H3588>when<s%> thou <S%H6213>preparest<s%> a <S%H1121>bullock<s%> <S%H1241><s%> for a burnt <S%H5930>offering,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> for a <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> in <S%H6381>performing<s%> a <S%H5088>vow,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> peace <S%H8002>offerings<s%> unto the LORD: <S%H3068><s%>

Then shall he <S%H7126>bring<s%> <S%H5921>with<s%> a <S%H1121>bullock<s%> <S%H1241><s%> a meat <S%H4503>offering<s%> of <S%H7969>three<s%> tenth <S%H6241>deals<s%> of <S%H5560>flour<s%> <S%H1101>mingled<s%> with <S%H2677>half<s%> a <S%H1969>hin<s%> of <S%H8081>oil.<s%>

And thou shalt <S%H7126>bring<s%> for a drink <S%H5262>offering<s%> <S%H2677>half<s%> a <S%H1969>hin<s%> of <S%H3196>wine,<s%> for an offering made by <S%H801>fire,<s%> of a <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>savor<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

Thus <S%H3602><s%> shall it be <S%H6213>done<s%> for <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7794>bullock,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> for <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H352>ram,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> for a <S%H7716>lamb,<s%> <S%H3532><s%> <S%H176>or<s%> a <S%H5795>kid.<s%>
According to the <S%H4557>number<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> ye shall <S%H6213>prepare,<s%> <S%H3602>so<s%> shall ye <S%H6213>do<s%> to every <S%H259>one<s%> according to their <S%H4557>number.<s%>

All <S%H3605><s%> that are born of the <S%H249>country<s%> shall <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H853><s%> these <S%H428>things<s%> after this <S%H3602>manner,<s%> in <S%H7126>offering<s%> an offering made by <S%H801>fire,<s%> of a <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>savor<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And <S%H3588>if<s%> a <S%H1616>stranger<s%> <S%H1481>sojourn<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> you, <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H834>whosoever<s%> be <S%H8432>among<s%> you in your <S%H1755>generations,<s%> and will <S%H6213>offer<s%> an offering made by <S%H801>fire,<s%> of a <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>savor<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> ye <S%H6213>do,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> he shall <S%H6213>do.<s%>

One <S%H259><s%> <S%H2708>ordinance<s%> shall be both for you of the <S%H6951>congregation,<s%> and also for the <S%H1616>stranger<s%> that <S%H1481>sojourneth<s%> with you, an <S%H2708>ordinance<s%> <S%H5769>forever<s%> in your <S%H1755>generations:<s%> as ye are, so shall the <S%H1616>stranger<s%> <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
One <S%H259><s%> <S%H8451>law<s%> and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H4941>manner<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> for you, and for the <S%H1616>stranger<s%> that <S%H1481>sojourneth<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> you.
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Speak <S%H1696><s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them, When ye <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>whither<s%> <S%H8033><s%> <S%H589>I<s%> <S%H935>bring<s%> you,

Then it shall <S%H1961>be,<s%> that, when ye <S%H398>eat<s%> of the <S%H4480>bread<s%> <S%H3899><s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> ye shall offer <S%H7311>up<s%> a heave <S%H8641>offering<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

Ye shall offer <S%H7311>up<s%> a <S%H2471>cake<s%> of the <S%H7225>first<s%> of your <S%H6182>dough<s%> for a heave <S%H8641>offering:<s%> as ye do the heave <S%H8641>offering<s%> of the <S%H1637>threshingfloor,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> shall ye <S%H7311>heave<s%> it.
Of the <S%H4480>first<s%> <S%H7225><s%> of your <S%H6182>dough<s%> ye shall <S%H5414>give<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> a heave <S%H8641>offering<s%> in your <S%H1755>generations.<s%>

And <S%H3588>if<s%> ye have <S%H7686>erred,<s%> and <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H6213>observed<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H4687>commandments,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H1696>spoken<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%>

Even <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H413><s%> you by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> Moses, and <S%H1973>henceforward<s%> among your <S%H1755>generations;<s%>

Then it shall <S%H1961>be,<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> aught be <S%H6213>committed<s%> by <S%H7684>ignorance<s%> without the <S%H4480>knowledge<s%> <S%H5869><s%> of the <S%H5712>congregation,<s%> that <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> shall <S%H6213>offer<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H1121>young<s%> <S%H1241><s%> <S%H6499>bullock<s%> for a burnt <S%H5930>offering,<s%> for a <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>savor<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> with his meat <S%H4503>offering,<s%> and his drink <S%H5262>offering,<s%> according to the <S%H4941>manner,<s%> and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8163>kid<s%> of the <S%H5795>goats<s%> for a sin <S%H2403>offering.<s%>

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall make an <S%H3722>atonement<s%> <S%H5921>for<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and it shall be <S%H5545>forgiven<s%> them; <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H1931>it<s%> is <S%H7684>ignorance:<s%> and <S%H1992>they<s%> shall <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H853><s%> their <S%H7133>offering,<s%> a sacrifice made by <S%H801>fire<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and their sin <S%H2403>offering<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H5921>for<s%> their ignorance: <S%H7684><s%>

And it shall be <S%H5545>forgiven<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and the <S%H1616>stranger<s%> that <S%H1481>sojourneth<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> them; <S%H3588>seeing<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> were in <S%H7684>ignorance.<s%>

And <S%H518>if<s%> <S%H259>any<s%> <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H2398>sin<s%> through <S%H7684>ignorance,<s%> then he shall <S%H7126>bring<s%> a she <S%H5795>goat<s%> of the <S%H1323>first<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> for a sin <S%H2403>offering.<s%>

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall make an <S%H3722>atonement<s%> <S%H5921>for<s%> the <S%H5315>soul<s%> that sinneth <S%H7683>ignorantly,<s%> when he <S%H2398>sinneth<s%> by <S%H7684>ignorance<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> to make an <S%H3722>atonement<s%> <S%H5921>for<s%> him; and it shall be <S%H5545>forgiven<s%> him.

Ye shall <S%H1961>have<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8451>law<s%> for him that <S%H6213>sinneth<s%> through <S%H7684>ignorance,<s%> both for him that is <S%H249>born<s%> among the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and for the <S%H1616>stranger<s%> that <S%H1481>sojourneth<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> them.

But the <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H6213>doeth<s%> aught <S%H3027>presumptuously,<s%> <S%H7311><s%> whether he be born in the <S%H4480>land,<s%> <S%H249><s%> or a <S%H1616>stranger,<s%> the <S%H1931>same<s%> <S%H1442>reproacheth<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> and <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H5315>soul<s%> shall be cut <S%H3772>off<s%> from <S%H4480>among<s%> <S%H7130><s%> his <S%H5971>people.<s%>

Because <S%H3588><s%> he hath <S%H959>despised<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and hath <S%H6565>broken<s%> his <S%H4687>commandment,<s%> <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H5315>soul<s%> shall utterly be cut <S%H3772>off;<s%> <S%H3772><s%> his <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> shall be upon him.

And while the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H1961>were<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> they <S%H4672>found<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> that <S%H7197>gathered<s%> <S%H6086>sticks<s%> upon the <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

And they that <S%H4672>found<s%> him <S%H7197>gathering<s%> <S%H6086>sticks<s%> <S%H7126>brought<s%> him <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> and <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation.<s%>
And they <S%H5117>put<s%> him in <S%H4929>ward,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> it was <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H6567>declared<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> should be <S%H6213>done<s%> to him.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> The <S%H376>man<s%> shall be surely put to <S%H4191>death:<s%> <S%H4191><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> shall <S%H7275>stone<s%> him with <S%H68>stones<s%> <S%H4480>without<s%> <S%H2351><s%> the <S%H4264>camp.<s%>

And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> <S%H3318>brought<s%> him <S%H413>without<s%> <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2351><s%> the <S%H4264>camp,<s%> and <S%H7275>stoned<s%> him with <S%H68>stones,<s%> and he <S%H4191>died;<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Speak <S%H1696><s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H559>bid<s%> <S%H413><s%> them that they <S%H6213>make<s%> them <S%H6734>fringes<s%> <S%H5921>in<s%> the <S%H3671>borders<s%> of their <S%H899>garments<s%> throughout their <S%H1755>generations,<s%> and that they <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H6734>fringe<s%> of the <S%H3671>borders<s%> a <S%H6616>ribbon<s%> of blue: <S%H8504><s%>

And it shall <S%H1961>be<s%> unto you for a <S%H6734>fringe,<s%> that ye may look <S%H7200>upon<s%> it, and <S%H2142>remember<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4687>commandments<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> them; and that ye <S%H8446>seek<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> your own <S%H3824>heart<s%> and your own <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H859>ye<s%> use to go a whoring: <S%H2181><s%>
That <S%H4616><s%> ye may <S%H2142>remember,<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H4687>commandments,<s%> and <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H6918>holy<s%> unto your <S%H430>God.<s%>

I <S%H589><s%> am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> brought you <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H853><s%> of the <S%H4480>land<s%> <S%H776><s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> to <S%H1961>be<s%> your <S%H430>God:<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>
